item.title: 创纪录价格抑制需求，中国黄金进口放缓
item.description: 中国上个月的金银进口放缓，因为面对创纪录的价格，世界最大消费国的需求开始疲软。【原文：China’s bullion imports slowed last month as demand in the world’s biggest consumer begins to buckle in the face of record prices.】

item.title: 海外公司寻求仍然低廉的资金，KKR推出日元债券
item.description: KKR & Co.正在销售日元债券，加入了海外发行商在日本央行进一步加息的押注下收益率进一步攀升之前筹集资金的行列。【原文：KKR & Co. is marketing yen bonds, joining overseas issuers raising funds before Japan’s yields climb further on bets of more interest rates hikes by the central bank.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索兑美元汇率跌破关键的 58 美元水平
item.description: 菲律宾比索跌破 1 美元兑 58 菲律宾比索跌破 1 美元兑 58 菲律宾比索跌破 1 美元兑 58【原文：The Philippine peso dropped past the key 58-per-dollar level, putting pressure on the central bank to step up efforts to support the currency.】

item.title: 本地蔬菜供应减少，新加坡增加食物来源
item.description: 一直在加强食品安全措施的新加坡，去年的本地蔬菜和海产品产量都有所下降。【原文：Singapore, which has been ramping up food security measures, saw its local vegetables and seafood production decline last year.】

item.title: 随着股市持续繁荣，大型 IPO 在印度卷土重来
item.description: 印度小规模首次公开募股的热潮可能很快会被更大规模的交易所取代，这将为希望加入印度股票狂潮的全球投资者提供更多选择。【原文：A boom in tiny initial public offerings in India may soon be followed by larger deals, broadening options for global investors looking to join the nation’s equities frenzy.】

item.title: 中国建筑商万科通过 1.66 亿美元的交易获得更多贷款
item.description: 中国万科集团正在申请更多的银行贷款，这表明这个陷入困境的行业风向标正在寻求更多的流动资金，以等待政府对建筑商的支持。【原文：China Vanke Co. is taking out more bank loans, a sign that the struggling industry’s bellwether is seeking more liquidity as it waits for government support for builders.】

item.title: 星牌股票在 Hard Rock 收购提案的混乱中下跌
item.description: Star Entertainment Group Ltd.股价下跌，原因是该公司称来自 Hard Rock Hotels & Resorts（太平洋）支持的一个集团的收购建议的有效性令人困惑。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd. shares fell amid confusion over the validity of a takeover proposal that it said came from a group backed by Hard Rock Hotels & Resorts (Pacific).】

item.title: 千禧年聘请 GIC 的纳伊米担任迪拜高级投资组合经理
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）已聘请新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）董事总经理纳德尔-纳伊米（Nader Naeimi）担任驻迪拜的高级投资组合经理。【原文：Millennium Management has hired GIC Pte Managing Director Nader Naeimi to become a senior portfolio manager based in Dubai, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本保险公司因回购和解除交叉持股而大涨
item.description: 在日本保险公司 MS&AD Insurance Group Holdings Inc. 和 Tokio Marine Holdings Inc. 宣布回购股票并计划出售其在客户公司的持股后，这两家公司的股价大涨。【原文：Shares of Japanese insurers MS&AD Insurance Group Holdings Inc. and Tokio Marine Holdings Inc. surged after the companies announced stock buybacks, as well as plans to sell their holdings in client companies.】

item.title: 地缘政治紧张局势未能撼动低迷市场，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于上周末中东和乌克兰的紧张局势不断升级，但却没有引发任何明显的价格波动，石油价格在周一小幅下跌后，在早盘交易中有所回落。【原文：Oil dipped in early trading after a modest loss on Monday as rising tension in the Middle East and Ukraine over the weekend did little to spark any significant price action.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好戴蒙称摩根大通接班 "进展顺利"。投资者在英伟达业绩公布前屏住呼吸。Bobby Jain 的新对冲基金计划大力发展大宗商品。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Dimon says JPMorgan succession ‘well on the way.’ Investors hold their breath before Nvidia results. Bobby Jain’s new hedge fund plans for major commodity push. item.title: 德意志银行私人信贷业务扩充亚洲团队
item.description: DB Investment Partners 正在亚洲建立私人信贷团队，理由是该地区具有吸引力的增长潜力和相对年轻的人口。【原文：DB Investment Partners is building up its private-credit team in Asia, citing the region’s attractive growth potential and relatively young population.】

item.title: 马来西亚机场股东对收购要约表示怀疑
item.description: Northcape Capital Ltd.称，由于估值过低，大股东将马来西亚机场控股有限公司私有化的提议可能会遭到反对。【原文：Northcape Capital Ltd. said a bid by major shareholders to take Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd. private may face opposition due to the low valuation offered.】

item.title: 市场综述：亚洲股市涨跌不一，交易者等待英伟达的到来
item.description: 在华尔街谨慎的交易时段之后，亚洲股市将迎来无精打采的一天，因为交易员们都在翘首以待周三英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）的财报。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a listless day following a cautious session on Wall Street as traders keenly await Wednesday’s earnings from Nvidia Corp., the chipmaker at the heart of the artificial-intelligence frenzy that’s powered the bull market.】

item.title: 关键证人称 "土拨鼠日 "交易为 Archegos 带来风险
item.description: Archegos 资本管理公司创始人 Bill Hwang 一旦决定了一笔交易，就会再做一次。再来一次一次又一次。资深员工们的反应是互相问候 "土拨鼠日快乐"，这是比尔-莫瑞（Bill Murray）的经典时间循环喜剧。【原文：Once Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang decided on a trade, he did it again. And again. And again. Senior staffers reacted by greeting each other with “Happy Groundhog Day,” a reference to the classic Bill Murray time-loop comedy.】

item.title: 摩根大通的科拉诺维奇是迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）辞职后最后一只著名的 "熊"。
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）周一投降，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：There’s just one big bear left in Wall Street’s forest of stock market opinions after Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson capitulated on Monday while JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Marko Kolanovic held firm in his gloomy outlook on equities.】

item.title: Peloton 启动 10 亿美元贷款，为现有债务再融资
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司在努力为现有债务再融资并从最近的销售低迷中恢复过来的同时，启动了一笔新贷款的销售。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. kicked off the sale of a new loan as it works to refinance existing debt and recover from a recent slump in sales.】

item.title: 纽约大型购物中心的市政债券暂时避免违约
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）认为，与纽约州最大的购物中心 Destiny USA 相关的市政债券很可能会违约，只是不会马上违约。【原文：Municipal bonds tied to Destiny USA, the biggest shopping mall in New York state, will probably default, just not imminently, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 以太币因 ETF 获批猜测而蹿升，引领加密货币涨势
item.description: 越来越多的人猜测，监管机构对一种或多种直接投资于第二大加密货币的交易所交易基金的反对态度正在缓和，因此以太币大涨，引领了数字资产的反弹。【原文：Ether surged, leading a rally in digital assets, amid growing speculation that opposition is easing among regulators toward one or more exchange-traded funds that invest directly in the second-biggest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 电气化将推动 UL Solutions 上市后的发展前景
item.description: 能源转型促进了从汽车到数据中心的电力需求，这将推动 UL Solutions Inc.【原文：The energy transition that’s boosting power demand for everything from cars to data centers will fuel earnings for UL Solutions Inc., the owner of the iconic UL-in-a-circle certification mark stamped on electronic products around the world.】

item.title: 彼得罗接替哥伦比亚陆军最高指挥官
item.description: 古斯塔沃-佩特罗（Gustavo Petro）总统于周一撤换了国家军队总司令。【原文：President Gustavo Petro replaced the nation’s army chief on Monday.】

item.title: Soroban Capital 与 Elliott 共同持有江森自控股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的压力下，Soroban Capital Partners 公司已在工业公司江森自控国际有限公司（Johnson Controls International Plc）中积累了大量股份。【原文：Soroban Capital Partners has amassed a large stake in industrials firm Johnson Controls International Plc in the wake of pressure from Elliott Investment Management, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储为银行提供的 "污名化 "应急工具在自己的会议上遭到抨击
item.description: 美联储需要采取更多措施，解决美国银行无法动用关键紧急贷款机制的问题。【原文：The Federal Reserve needs to do more to address issues that keep US banks from tapping a key emergency lending facility.】

item.title: 前纽维安交易员因内幕交易计划获刑 70 个月
item.description: Nuveen 公司的一名前股票交易员承认，他向另一名男子通风报信，将公司的交易作为 4,700 万美元前线操作计划的一部分，因此被判入狱近六年。【原文：A former Nuveen equity trader was ordered to spend almost six years behind bars after admitting he tipped off another man to the firm’s trades as part of a $47 million front-running scheme.】

item.title: 俄罗斯在满足当地需求后暂时允许出口汽油
item.description: 由于国内供应已满足需求，俄罗斯暂时取消了汽油出口禁令，以避免炼油厂库存过多。【原文：Russia temporarily lifted its ban on gasoline exports to avoid overstocking at refineries as domestic supplies have met demand.】

item.title: 力拓宣布澳大利亚氧化铝货物不可抗力
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，力拓集团已经宣布，由于运营所需的天然气短缺，其位于澳大利亚昆士兰州的炼油厂的氧化铝货物将面临不可抗力。【原文：Rio Tinto Group has declared force majeure on alumina cargoes from its refineries in Queensland, Australia, due to shortages of gas to power its operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description: 机器人投资者越来越多地接管信贷市场。【原文：Robot investors are increasingly taking over credit markets.】

item.title: 美国小麦拯救受俄罗斯小麦短缺困扰的市场
item.description: 小麦是世界上最重要的农作物之一。这种谷物用于制作面包、粗麦粉、小面包和面条等主食。【原文：Wheat is one of the world’s most-vital crops. The grain is used in staples like bread, couscous, chapatis and noodles — and high prices for the commodity have a long history of kickstarting unrest.】

item.title: Blackstone 在 10 亿美元交易中给予 Press Ganey 难得的灵活性
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 主导了约 10 亿美元的优先股权投资，为 Press Ganey 的债务再融资提供支持，其中包括罕见的优惠条件，使该公司所有者在未来几个月内更容易出售股权或将业务上市。【原文：Blackstone Inc. led a roughly $1 billion preferred-equity investment backing Press Ganey’s debt refinancing that includes rare concessions that make it easier for the company’s owners to sell a stake or list the business over the coming months.】
